About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a web developer with extensive project management experience. I was fascinated by software development while working as a project manager in the engineering sector. Since then, I joined a Bootcamp and have been learning and building websites and apps. I enjoy learning new things, and as a developer, I believe learning will never end for me.
